title: Our Thoughts Are Connected!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>I wonder if Riko-chan will come out to the balcony......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ah, Chika-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whoa! You heard me talking to myself!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You were talking to yourself? About what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I was wondering if you were going to come out to the balcony. So I guess you didn’t hear me? Why did you come out here?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Umm...... Just because? I was thinking about our next song.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Whaaat!? Me too! I was thinking about our next song! That’s why I wanted to talk to you, Riko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You used telepathy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hehehe~ Our thoughts are connected. Hey, Riko-chan, what kind of song are you composing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Well, it’s kind of hard to describe. Could you come over to my room? If I play it, you’ll get it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Alright, I’ll come! I’ll be there in a minute!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
